title: ChatGPT can now search the web, as OpenAI races to keep up with rivals
description: OpenAI said Wednesday its ChatGPT bot now has the ability to search the web using Microsoft’s Bing search engine, putting the chatbot on equal footing with Microsoft and Google’s Bard as the startup fights to compete for dominance of the booming AI industry.

title: Meta pushes ahead to make VR and face cameras happen
description: Meta wants to blend real and virtual worlds. One of its new products inches toward that goal; the other could help smart glasses go mainstream.

title: Meta introduces ChatGPT competitor, AI tools amid industry arms race
description: Meta AI, a new conversational chatbot, will populate WhatsApp, Messenger and Instagram — an attempt to compete with OpenAI’s popular ChatGPT.

title: Tech CEO’s killing sparks manhunt for ‘extremely dangerous’ suspect, police say
description: Jason Dean Billingsley, 32, is charged with first-degree murder in the killing of Pava LaPere, a 26-year-old CEO of a tech start-up in Baltimore, police said.

title: Lina Khan’s Amazon lawsuit is nothing like her famous law article
description: The Amazon lawsuit the FTC filed Tuesday shows how Lina Khan has evolved as a regulator.

title: NASA astronaut bound for Earth after record 371 days in space
description: Frank Rubio is expected to land in Kazakhstan around 7 a.m. Eastern time Wednesday in a Russian Soyuz spacecraft, according to NASA.

title: He live-streamed his attacks on Indian Muslims. YouTube gave him an award.
description: Hindu vigilantes have long tried to stop the cow trade, often carried out by Muslims, but have become more extreme and flamboyant thanks to American social media platforms that reward them with large online followings.

title: Inside the vast digital campaign by Hindu nationalists to inflame India
description: India’s BJP, led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, and affiliated Hindu nationalist groups have perfected using social media to spread of inflammatory, often false and bigoted material on an industrial scale, earning both envy and condemnation beyond India’s borders.

title: Under India’s pressure, Facebook let propaganda and hate speech thrive
description: Facebook has retreated from its professed ideals in India under pressure from Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party.
